body:
at g.e-hentai cdrm posted a nice summary of the story in english:"
Girl's boyfriend said he liked dogs -> Girl wants to buy a dog for the boyfriend.

Shopkeeper confirms that girl has not thought out the living conditions for the dog.

Fortunately there is a kind of dog you can keep regardless of environment.

Girl is invited to wear a blindfold and change her clothes to meet this kind of dog.

Guy says that given such a cute and amazing dog, a marriage proposal might be in order...

Normally you stroke the outside of a pet, but this type you stroke their insides, and this shop has a great reputation for stroking.

Girl enjoys it so much she can't return to being human.

Package containing pet arrives at the boyfriend's house from the girlfriend. Boyfriend voices complaint that his house can't keep pets..."
